name: There Is A Spikey Ball In The Bathtub (And Our Butts Are Exposed)
name_original: There Is A Spikey Ball In The Bathtub (And Our Butts Are Exposed)
description: This game is primarily an experiment with peer-to-peer multiplayer in a browser. I have tried various experiments to improve synchronization between the clients, but the underlying technology is not optimized for a low-latency game like this (WebSockets). I'll be writing up the technical details on my site soon.
